root: ^A faded, old cloak hangs on a wooden stand. It smells faintly, inexplicably, like your mother’s kitchen on a rainy day.

c-0: ^You pull the cloak over your shoulders. It shimmers and reforms into a fine [Arcanum Robe], the comforting scent lingering within its threads.
c-1: ^You close your eyes and inhale the scent of home. The feeling of safety and comfort is so profound, it washes away all your wounds. (Heal 100% HP)
